plot: Cheol-min kills off his father-in-law and makes off with the only copy of his will. The fortune passes to the dead mans wife. As Cheol-min conspires with his girlfriend to murder his spouse...
title: Uiheomhan nampyeon
plot_es: Cheol-min kills off his father-in-law and makes off with the only copy of his will. The fortune passes to the dead mans wife. As Cheol-min conspires with his girlfriend to murder his spouse...
plot_en: Cheol-min kills off his father-in-law and makes off with the only copy of his will. The fortune passes to the dead mans wife. As Cheol-min conspires with his girlfriend to murder his spouse...
